range.description: Range of Ring device. Mapped to TX gain setting.

rangeMin.description: Minimum range of Ring device, read-only

rangeMax.description: Maximum range of Ring device, read-only

holdRadius.description: Radius of the ring generated when activating the 'holdingPattern' interception mode

holdRadiusMin.description: Minimum radius of the ring generated when activating the 'holdingPattern' interception mode, read-only

holdRadiusMax.description: Maximum radius of the ring generated when activating the 'holdingPattern' interception mode, read-only

pushBackHeading.description: The heading the target will be pushed when activating the 'pushBack' interception mode

targetLocation.description: Coordinates to use when Ring device is manually activated in either 'holdingPattern' or 'pushBack' mode. If null, the location of the Ring device is used.

lat.description: Latitude used in the activated interception mode

lon.description: Longitude used in the activated interception mode

height.description: Height relative to installation plane used in the activated interception mode

staticLocation.description: Coordinates to use when Ring device is manually activated in 'static' mode. If null, the location of the Ring device is used.

lat.description: Latitude used in the activated interception mode

lon.description: Longitude used in the activated interception mode

height.description: Height relative to installation plane used in the activated interception mode

autoEcmMode.description: Name of the interception mode when Ring device is activated by automatic ECM

autoEcmLocation.description: Coordinates to use when Ring device is activated by automatic ECM. If null, the location of the Ring device is used.

lat.description: Latitude used when Ring device is activated by automatic ECM

lon.description: Longitude used when Ring device is activated by automatic ECM

height.description: Height relative to installation plane used when Ring device is activated by automatic ECM
